source.title: Self-Supervised Learning from Images with a Joint-Embedding Predictive Architecture

confidence_rationale: Shows strong predictive representation with target-encoder asymmetry and masked prediction structure.

mapping.source_claim_statement: I-JEPA learns semantic representations by predicting target embeddings from context using an asymmetric architecture.
mapping.ree_translation: Supports MECH-058 directional claim that target-anchor asymmetry can improve stable abstraction learning.
mapping.mapping_caveat: Evidence focuses on image representations and does not establish full stress-regime robustness criteria by itself.
mapping.source_context: Self-supervised vision model with large-scale benchmark evaluation.

confidence_components.notes: Good support for asymmetry mechanism, moderate transfer risk to REE dynamics.
